summary: 17 CFR § 230.424 outlines the requirements for filing prospectuses with the SEC, specifying that five copies of any pre-effective prospectus with substantive changes must be filed, and ten copies of each post-effective prospectus must be filed unless it only contains omitted information or is used in specific offerings. The regulation details various deadlines for filing these prospectuses, depending on the type of changes or the nature of the offering.
